Headline: Linden-bound Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
